trans-unit.source: is a subfolder of the source folder
Files you've previously accessed will show up here
Send the developers an issue report with detailed information
Show extensions for known file types
Open a specific page or pages

To get started, you'll need to grant us permission to display your files. This will open a Settings page where you can grant us this permission. You'll need to reopen the app once you've completed this step.
trans-unit.target: Lietotnei nepieciešama atļauja, lai piekļūtu Jūsu failiem. Tiks atvērta Iestatījumu lapa, kurā Jūs varēsiet to piešķirt. Pēc tam lietotne būs jāatver atkārtoti.

trans-unit.source: An item with this name already exists in this directory.
trans-unit.target: Šajā mapē jau pastāv vienums ar šādu nosaukumu.

trans-unit.source: We weren't able to delete this item
Please insert the necessary drive to access this item.
trans-unit.target: Lūdzu ievietojiet vajadzīgo disku, lai piekļūtu šim vienumam.

trans-unit.source: The file you are attempting to access may have been moved or deleted.
trans-unit.target: Fails, kuram mēģināt piekļūt, iespējams, tika pārvietots vai dzēsts.

trans-unit.source: The file you are attempting to preview may have been moved or deleted.
trans-unit.target: Fails, kuru mēģināt priekšskatīt, iespējams, tika pārvietots vai dzēsts.

trans-unit.source: The folder you are attempting to access may have been moved or deleted.
trans-unit.target: Mape, kurai mēģināt piekļūt, iespējams, tika pārvietota vai dzēsta.

trans-unit.source: The file you're trying to delete is currently being used by an another application.
trans-unit.target: Fails, kuru mēģināt dzēst, tiek izmantots citā lietotnē.

trans-unit.source: The requested operation is not supported
The item name must not contain the following characters: \ / : * ? " < > |
trans-unit.target: Vienuma nosaukums nevar saterēt sekojošos simbolus: \ / : * ? " < > |

trans-unit.source: The item name must not contain the following characters: \ / : * ? " < > |
trans-unit.target: Vienuma nosaukums nevar saterēt sekojošos simbolus: \ / : * ? " < > |

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to permanently delete all these items?
trans-unit.target: Vai esat pārliecināti, ka vēlaties dzēst visus šos failus?

trans-unit.source: Enter password to unlock the drive
Please check the password and try again.
Open folder in a new tab
When opening a folder in Files
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.

trans-unit.source: Can't access any items to display
trans-unit.target: Nevar piekļūt nevienam vienumam, ko parādīt

trans-unit.source: The source and destination file names are the same.
trans-unit.target: Avota un mērķa failu nosaukumi sakrīt.

trans-unit.source: The destination folder is the same as the source folder.
trans-unit.target: Mērķa mape ir arī avota mape.

trans-unit.source: Files ran into a problem that the developers didn't prepare for yet.
trans-unit.target: Failiem radās problēma, kurai izstrādātāji vēl nebija sagatavojušies.

trans-unit.source: Find out what's new in Files
The item referenced is either invalid or inaccessible.{0}Error message:{0}{1}
trans-unit.target: Atsauktais vienums ir vai nu nederīgs vai nepieejams.{0}Kļūdas ziņojums:{0}{1}

trans-unit.source: There's nothing to share right now...
The items you've selected will be shared
The selected item will be shared
The item you're attempting to rename no longer exists. Please verify the correct location of the item you need to rename.
trans-unit.target: Vienums, kuru mēģināt pārdēvēt, vairs nepastāv. Pārbaudiet pārdēvējamā faila atrašanās vietu.

trans-unit.source: The name specified was invalid. Please check the desired item name and try again.
trans-unit.target: Norādītais nosaukums nav derīgs. Pārbaudiet vēlamo nosaukumu un mēģiniet vēlreiz.

trans-unit.source: The length of the item name specified exceeds the maximum limit. Please check the desired name and try again.
trans-unit.target: Vienuma nosaukuma garums pārsniedz maksimālo atļauto garumu. Pārbaudiet vēlamo nosaukumu un mēģiniet vēlreiz.

trans-unit.source: The application needs to be restarted in order to apply the language setting, would you like to restart the app?
trans-unit.target: Lietotni nepieciešams restartēt, lai pielietotu valodas iestatījumu. Vai vēlaties restartēt lietotni?

trans-unit.source: We weren't able to create this item
Are you sure you want to delete these {0} items?
trans-unit.target: Vai esat droši, ka vēlaties dzēst šos {0} vienumus?

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
trans-unit.target: Vai tiešām vēlaties dzēst šo vienumu?

trans-unit.source: Selects the best multitasking control based on how the app window is resized. When the window is small, you'll notice the horizontal tab strip is collapsed into a flyout on the navigation toolbar.
trans-unit.target: Atlasa labāko daudzuzdevumu veikšanas režīmu, balstoties uz lietotnes loga izmēriem. Kad logs ir mazs, horizontālā ciļņu josla tiek saspiesta izlidojošajā logā navigācijas rīkjoslā.

trans-unit.source: Always hides the vertical multitasking flyout from the navigation toolbar, and shows the traditional horizontal tabstrip on the app window. This is suited for users who need to keep track of every open app instance at all times.
trans-unit.target: Vienmēr paslēpj vertikālo daudzuzdevumu veikšanas logu no navigācijas rīkjoslas, un parāda tradicionālo horizontālo ciļņu rīkjoslu lietotnes logā. Šis ir piemērots lietotājiem, kuriem nepārtraukti nepieciešams sekot līdzi visām lietotnes instancēm.

trans-unit.source: Collapses the horizontal list of app instances into a vertical flyout on the navigation toolbar, designed for users who want a clean app interface with on-demand access to a multitasking experience.
trans-unit.target: Sakļauj horizontālo lietotnes instanču sarakstu vertikālā izlidojošajā logā navigācijas rīkjoslā. Izstrādāts lietotājiem, kuri vēlas tīru saskarni ar vieglu piekļuvi citām instancēm.

trans-unit.source: Choose a type for this new item below
Move overflow items into a sub menu
Pin Recycle Bin to the sidebar
Show a confirmation dialog when deleting files or folders
trans-unit.target: Rādīt piekrišanas izvēlni, kad tiek dzēsti faili vai mapes

trans-unit.source: There was an issue saving some properties.
Open items with a single click
Show drives on the home page
Show library cards on the home page
Show recent files on the home page
The device can now be safely removed from the computer.
trans-unit.target: Tagad ierīci var droši izņemt no datora.

trans-unit.source: This device is currently in use. Close any programs, windows or tabs that might be using the device, and then try again.
trans-unit.target: Ierīce pašlaik tiek lietota. Aizveriet visas lietotnes, logus vai cilnes, kas varētu lietot šo ierīci, un mēģiniet vēlreiz.

trans-unit.source: Some properties may contain personal information.
Check the status of file operations here
Find out what's new in Files
Send the developers an issue report with more information
List and sort directories alongside files
trans-unit.target: Parādiet un kārtojiet mapes kopā ar failiem

trans-unit.source: Do you want to download and install the latest version of Files?
trans-unit.target: Vai Jūs vēlaties lejupielādēt un instalēt jaunāko Failu versiju?

trans-unit.source: Show unindexed items when searching for files and folders (searches may take longer)
trans-unit.target: Meklējot parādīt neindeksētos vienumus (meklēšana var būt ilgāka)

trans-unit.source: Enable individual preferences for individual directories
Customize the right click context menu
Cache files and folders for better performance
trans-unit.target: Ātrdarbībai glabāt failus un mapes kešatmiņā

trans-unit.source: Preemptive cache parallel limit (smaller numbers should work better for hard drives)
trans-unit.target: Preventīās kešatmiņas paralēlais ierobežojums (mazākam skaitlim vajadzētu strādāt labāk uz cietajiem diskiem)

trans-unit.source: Always open new tabs in dual pane mode
trans-unit.target: Vienmēr atvērt jaunas cilnes dubultajā paneļu režīmā

trans-unit.source: Enable animations when opening and closing the context menu
trans-unit.target: Iespējot animācijas, atverot un aizverot konteksta izvēlni

trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.

trans-unit.source: Bundle with the same name already exists!
trans-unit.target: Saišķis ar to pašu nosaukumu jau pastāv!

trans-unit.source: Drag and drop any file or folder here to quickly access it
trans-unit.target: Velciet un nometiet failus vai mapes šeit

trans-unit.source: Show bundles on the home page
Find tips & tricks and learn more about Files
trans-unit.target: Atrast padomus & un uzzināt vairāk par Failiem

trans-unit.source: Enable multiselect options (currently only available in the tiles and grid view layout modes)
trans-unit.target: Iespējot vairākatlases opcijas (šobrīd pieejams tikai mozaīkas un režģa skatu režīmos)

trans-unit.source: If you change a file extension, the file might become unusable. Are you sure you want to change it?
trans-unit.target: Ja nomainīsiet faila paplašinājumu, fails var palikt nelietojams. Vai tiešām vēlaties to mainīt?

trans-unit.source: Use preemptive cache (preload entries in child directories on navigation)
trans-unit.target: Izmantot preventīvu saglabāšanu kešatmiņā (preventīvi ielādēt apakšvienumus)

trans-unit.source: Show library section on the sidebar
Would you like to continue as administrator?
trans-unit.target: Would you like to continue as administrator?
